name: Cithria 2D platformer Demo
description:
Hellooo , this is a second demo fixing some issues with the previous one , feel free to give any feedback on what can be improved in the comments , love you !

added features :

pause button

shaking camera on dashing

sound effect on jumping

reducing the level difficulty

particles on moving

game music made by xDeviruchi

if you find any bugs feel free to comment them , thank you for playing !
